Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: It’s still great! New groom this morning over a strong base with fresh snow . The upper loops have great coverage : both the skate and classic are premium .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are covered in heavy wet snow this morning. We do not plan to groom today.
nubsNob.comments: DELAYED OPENING. We hope to open the lifts at 10 AM this morning. Five inches of wet snow landed at Nub's Nob this morning. The wind is up today. The Grooming Crew is out in full force to prepare the slopes. Right now we plan to run the lifts from 10 AM to 4:30 PM. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
